creator: Betterment
descriptionHtml:
Not sure what to do with your money? Betterment is built to help. From helping you save more on your cash to investing for the long term, Betterment helps you manage your money so that you can live better.

Spend with Checking
• No fee account‡
• ATM fees reimbursed worldwide
• FDIC insured up to $250k

Save with Cash Reserve
• Grow your savings with our high-yield cash account
• Eligible for FDIC insurance up to $1M with our program banks†
• Unlimited money transfers

Invest with smart tech
• Financial goals: We help you figure out your investing goals like retirement or saving for college, and provide ongoing advice to help you reach them
• Money management: We build and manage your personalized investment portfolio of low-cost ETFs
• Low, transparent fee of 0.25% annually

‡ Checking accounts and the Betterment Visa Debit Card provided and issued by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. Funds deposited into Checking will be eligible for up to $250k of FDIC insurance. Betterment Checking made available through Betterment Financial LLC. Neither Betterment Financial LLC, nor any of their affiliates, is a bank. Betterment Financial LLC reimburses ATM fees and the Visa® 1% foreign transaction fee worldwide, everywhere Visa is accepted.
APY is variable. $10 minimum deposit. No minimum balance. Visit betterment.com/cash-management for full details.
†Cash Reserve (“CR”) offered by Betterment LLC. Betterment LLC clients may participate in CR through brokerage accounts held at Betterment Securities. Neither Betterment LLC nor any of its affiliates is a bank. Through CR clients' funds are deposited into one or more banks ("Program Banks") where funds earn a variable interest rate and are eligible for FDIC insurance. Through CR clients can earn interest on cash intended to purchase securities through Betterment LLC and Betterment Securities. CR is not a long-term investment option.
Funds held in your brokerage account are not FDIC-insured but are protected by SIPC. Funds in transit to or from Program Banks are generally not FDIC-insured but are protected by SIPC, except when those funds are held in a sweep account following a deposit or prior to a withdrawal, at which time funds are eligible for FDIC insurance but are not protected by SIPC. See Betterment Client Agreements at betterment.com/legal for details. Funds deposited into CR are eligible for up to $1M FDIC insurance once funds reach one or more Program Banks (up to $250k each at up to 4 Program Banks). Even if there are more than 4 Program Banks, Clients will not necessarily have deposits allocated to provide FDIC insurance above $1M. FDIC insurance limits based on all accounts held in the same insurable capacity at a bank. Excluding one or more Program Banks from receiving deposits may lower the amount of FDIC insurance available through CR. Clients are responsible for monitoring total assets at each Program Bank, including existing deposits at Program Banks outside of CR to ensure FDIC insurance limits are not exceeded. For more info on FDIC insurance see www.FDIC.gov. Deposits held in Program Banks not protected by SIPC. For more info see betterment.com/legal/cash-reserve and betterment.com/adv.
Advisory services provided by Betterment LLC, an SEC-registered investment adviser. Brokerage services provided to clients of Betterment LLC by Betterment Securities www.bettermentsecurities.com, an SEC-registered broker-dealer and member of FINRA/SIPC.
Investments in securities: Not FDIC Insured • No Bank Guarantee • May Lose Value. Investing in securities involves risks, and there is always the potential of losing money when you invest in securities. Before investing, consider your investment objectives and Betterment's charges and expenses. Not an offer, solicitation of an offer, or advice to buy or sell securities in jurisdictions where Betterment is not registered. All images and return figures shown are for illustrative purposes only and are not actual customer or model returns.

What do you want to do with your money? Whether you’re buying the week’s groceries, saving for a new kitchen, or investing for your golden years, you can do it all with the Betterment app. Spend, save, build wealth, and get advice to help make your financial dreams real.

Spend with ease
• No-fee‡ checking account + Visa debit card w/ATM fees reimbursed worldwide
• Great for: Hassle-free daily spending

Save for what matters to you
• High-yield cash account to earn more
• Great for: Saving for something soon, like a vacation or new bike

Invest for the future
• Optimized ETF portfolios and advice
• Great for: Investing for big ticket items, like a down payment or education

Retire your way
• Planning, advice, and low-cost IRAs
• Great for: Retiring at 65 or 45, beach or city—whatever you want your golden years to look like

You might be wondering who you’ll become after you download this app. Our goal is to help you become a self-assured, finances-in-control, big-picture kind of investor. We’ll help you invest your money for the things you want most, so you can live better. Join the 600,000 people who set financial goals and invest with us. Check out important disclosures in the final image above.

Easy peasy because you’ve got a lot going on
✅ Sign up in 3 minutes
✅ Invest in 1000s of global companies at once
✅ $10 min deposit to get started
✅ No minimum balance
✅ One low, annual fee of 0.25%

Optimized to help you save more because duh
🤓 Automated trading tools
🤓 Tax-saving strategies
🤓 Safe and secure
🤓 Connect outside accounts to see your big picture
🤓 As your fiduciary, our financial advice puts your best interests first

Personalized because we like you just the way you are
✨ Designed for your personal goals
✨ Built for all levels of investing experience
✨ Customize your stock-and-bond risk level
✨ Choose from our socially responsible options
✨ Financial advice from our experts for an added cost

Do even more with Betterment
💰 Manage your everyday spending with Checking
💰 Get rewards at 1000s of brands with the Betterment Visa® Debit Card1
💰 Bucket your savings with Cash Reserve and earn interest on your cash
💰 Save for retirement with an IRA (Roth, Traditional)
💰 401(k) plans are available for businesses

The proof is in the numbers (we like those around here)
💙 600,000+ customers
💙 $28 billion AUM

See what we’re all about on:
📱 Instagram: @BettermentHQ
📱 Twitter: @Betterment

---

1Eligible when using your Betterment Visa® Debit Card. Cash back merchants and offers may vary. You’ll see rewards, which are deposited back into your Checking account, in as little as one day after making the qualifying purchase, but it may take up to 90 days depending on the merchant. In order to find you relevant offers, we share your Betterment Visa Debit Card transaction information (and location, if you choose) with our rewards partner, Dosh. Shared data is anonymized and Dosh is prohibited from selling shared data to any third parties. See Terms and Conditions to learn more.

Checking accounts and the Betterment Visa Debit Card provided and issued by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. Checking made available through Betterment Financial LLC. Neither Betterment Financial LLC, nor any of their affiliates, is a bank. Betterment Financial LLC reimburses ATM fees and the Visa® 1% foreign transaction fee worldwide, everywhere Visa is accepted.

title: Betterment: Saving & Investing | Grow your money

creator: Betterment
descriptionHtml:
You might be wondering why you should download this investing app. It’s simple: Betterment is built to make investing easy, with a personalized experience that fits your needs whether you’re an investor-in-training or a market guru. We’ll help you invest your money for the things you want most, so you can live better. Join the 650,000+ people who entrust us with over $30 billion. See important disclosures in the final image above.

You’ve got a lot going on, so we made it easy
✅ Sign up in 3 minutes
✅ Invest in expert-built portfolios of global companies
✅ $10 min deposit
✅ No minimum balance
✅ One low, annual fee of 0.25%

Optimized to help you save more because duh
🤓 Automated trading tools
🤓 Tax-saving automation
🤓 Safe and secure
🤓 Connect outside accounts to see your big picture
🤓 Fiduciary financial advice that puts your best interests first

Personalized because we like you just the way you are
✨ Designed for your personal goals
✨ Built for all levels of investing experience
✨ Customize your stock-and-bond risk level
✨ Choose from our socially responsible options
✨ Upgrade for more personal service from an expert financial advisor

Get more with Betterment
💰 Manage your everyday spending with Checking
💰 Get rewards at 1000s of brands with the Betterment Visa® Debit Card1
💰 Save and earn interest on your cash with Cash Reserve
💰 Save for retirement with an IRA (Roth, Traditional)
💰 Get a 401(k) plan for your business

The proof is in the numbers (we like those around here)
💙 650,000+ clients
💙 $30 billion managed

See what we’re all about:
📱 Instagram: @BettermentHQ
📱 Twitter: @Betterment

About us:
Welcome to the Betterment app! If you’re interested in saving and investing, you’re in the right place. We’re more than just a delightful investing experience with a hopeful name. Here’s why we think our saving and investing app is so much better.
As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Getting started takes minutes, there’s no minimum balance. You can save for specific goals or keep it general. Then you’ll invest in one of our expert-built stock-and-bond ETF portfolios.
Once you set up your investment goals, you can trust us to handle the details. Or, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can customize your portfolio, select your own ETFs, and more. You can feel confident either way because your best interests are our best interests.
And, as your financial advisor, we’ll give you guidance on how to make smart decisions to work toward achieving your financial goals along the way:
- We recommend how to invest your money and fund your goals over time.
- If you’re ever behind on your saving, we provide helpful nudges to get you back on track.
We also provide features that can help you save on taxes, so you can keep more of your hard-earned money.
You can also make an impact with your investment portfolio. Our Socially Responsible Investing ESG portfolio options (Broad Impact, Social Impact, and Climate Impact) enable you to invest in stock-and-bond ETFs that support minority empowerment and gender diversity, lower carbon emissions, and the funding of green projects.
Keep track of your financial life across your short and long-term money goals with one easy-to-use app.
Download the app to see the Betterment difference.
Start investing with Betterment today, for a better tomorrow.
---
Checking accounts and the Betterment Visa Debit Card provided and issued by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. Checking made available through Betterment Financial LLC. Neither Betterment Financial LLC, nor any of their affiliates, is a bank. Betterment Financial LLC reimburses ATM fees and the Visa® 1% foreign transaction fee worldwide, everywhere Visa is accepted.

📱 Twitter: @Betterment

About us:
Welcome to the Betterment app! If you’re interested in saving and investing, you’re in the right place. We’re more than just a delightful investing experience with a hopeful name. Here’s why we think our saving and investing app is so much better.
As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Getting started takes minutes, there’s no minimum balance. You can save for specific goals or keep it general. Then you’ll invest in one of our expert-built stock-and-bond ETF portfolios.
Once you set up your investment goals, you can trust us to handle the details. Or, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can customize your portfolio, select your own ETFs, and more. You can feel confident either way because your best interests are our best interests.
And, as your financial advisor, we’ll give you guidance on how to make smart decisions to work toward achieving your financial goals along the way:
- We recommend how to invest your money and fund your goals over time.
- If you’re ever behind on your saving, we provide helpful nudges to get you back on track.
We also provide features that can help you save on taxes, so you can keep more of your hard-earned money.
You can also make an impact with your investment portfolio. Our Socially Responsible Investing ESG portfolio options (Broad Impact, Social Impact, and Climate Impact) enable you to invest in stock-and-bond ETFs that support minority empowerment and gender diversity, lower carbon emissions, and the funding of green projects.
Keep track of your financial life across your short and long-term money goals with one easy-to-use app.
Download the app to see the Betterment difference.
Start investing with Betterment today, for a better tomorrow.
---

About us:
Welcome to the Betterment app! If you’re interested in saving and investing, you’re in the right place. We’re more than just a delightful investing experience with a hopeful name. Here’s why we think our saving and investing app is so much better.
As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Getting started takes minutes, there’s no minimum balance. You can save for specific goals or keep it general. Then you’ll invest in an expert-built stock-and-bond ETF portfolio.
Once you set up your investment goals, you can trust us to handle the details. Or, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can customize your portfolio, select your own ETFs, and more. And, as your financial advisor, we’ll give you guidance on how to make smart decisions to work toward achieving your financial savings goals along the way:
- We recommend how to invest your money and fund your savings goals over time.
- If you’re ever behind on your saving, we provide helpful nudges to get you back on track.
We also provide features that can help you save money on taxes, so you can keep more of your hard-earned money.
You can also make an impact with your investment portfolio. Our Socially Responsible Investing ESG portfolio options (Broad Impact, Social Impact, and Climate Impact) enable you to invest in stock-and-bond ETFs that support minority empowerment and gender diversity, lower carbon emissions, and the funding of green projects.
Keep track of your financial life across your short and long-term savings goals with one easy-to-use app.
Start investing with Betterment today, for a better tomorrow.

So, you might be wondering why you should download this investing app. It’s simple: Betterment is built to make investing easy, with a personalized experience that fits your needs whether you’re an investor-in-training or a stock market guru. Invest your money for the things you want most, so you can live better. Join the 700,000+ people who entrust us with over $32 billion. See important disclosures in the final image above.

Investments made easy, because you’ve got a lot going on
✅ Sign up in 3 minutes
✅ Invest in expert-built portfolios of global companies
✅ Start investing with a $10 min deposit
✅ No minimum balance
✅ One low, annual fee of 0.25%

Save more money because duh
🤓 Automated investing tools
🤓 Tax saving automation
🤓 Investments are safe and secure
🤓 Connect outside accounts to see your big picture
🤓 Financial advice that puts your best interest first

Personalized financial planning, because we like you just the way you are
✨ Investing designed for your personal savings goals
✨ Investment tools built for all levels of experience
✨ Customize your stock-and-bond risk level
✨ Invest in our socially responsible options
✨ Financial advisor - Upgrade for more personal service from an expert

Get more with Betterment
💰 Manage money for everyday spending with Checking
💰 Rewards on 1000s of brands with the Betterment Visa® Debit Card
💰 Save money and earn interest on your cash with Cash Reserve
💰 Retirement saving with an IRA (Roth, Traditional)
💰 Retirement planning with a 401(k) plan for your business

The proof is in the numbers (we like those around here)
💙 700,000+ clients
💙 $32 billion managed

See what we’re all about:
📱 Instagram: @BettermentHQ
📱 Twitter: @Betterment

About us:
Welcome to the Betterment app! If you’re interested in saving and investing, you’re in the right place. We’re more than just a delightful investing experience with a hopeful name. Here’s why we think our saving and investing app is so much better.
As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Getting started takes minutes, there’s no minimum balance. You can save for specific goals or keep it general. Then you’ll invest in an expert-built stock-and-bond ETF portfolio.
Once you set up your investment goals, you can trust us to handle the details. Or, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can customize your portfolio, select your own ETFs, and more. And, as your financial advisor, we’ll give you guidance on how to make smart decisions to work toward achieving your financial savings goals along the way:
- We recommend how to invest your money and fund your savings goals over time.
- If you’re ever behind on your saving, we provide helpful nudges to get you back on track.
We also provide features that can help you save money on taxes, so you can keep more of your hard-earned money.
You can also make an impact with your investment portfolio. Our Socially Responsible Investing ESG portfolio options (Broad Impact, Social Impact, and Climate Impact) enable you to invest in stock-and-bond ETFs that support minority empowerment and gender diversity, lower carbon emissions, and the funding of green projects.
Keep track of your financial life across your short and long-term savings goals with one easy-to-use app.
Start investing with Betterment today, for a better tomorrow.
---

Betterment Financial LLC reimburses ATM fees and the Visa® 1% foreign transaction fee worldwide, everywhere Visa is accepted.

So, you might be wondering why you should download this investing app. It’s simple: Betterment is built to make investing easy, with a personalized experience that fits your needs whether you’re an investor-in-training or a stock market guru. Invest your money for the things you want most, so you can live better. Join the 730,000+ people who entrust us with over $30.7 billion. See important disclosures in the final image above.

With Betterment, you can invest in expert-built, automated portfolios of investments with ETFs (stocks and bonds) and now, cryptocurrency. Diversifying your assets is now simpler than ever with Bitcoin, Ethereum and more. Guided investing allows you to better understand crypto with educational resources to help you stay in the know.

Investments made easy because you’ve got a lot going on
✅ Sign up in 3 minutes
✅ Start investing with a $10 min deposit
✅ No minimum balance
✅ One low, annual fee of 0.25%

Ways to save more
🤓 Tax saving features
🤓 Save money and earn interest on your cash with Cash Reserve
🤓 Competitive high interest rates (variable APY)
🤓 Rewards on 1000s of brands with the Betterment Visa® Debit Card¹

Personalized financial planning because we like you just the way you are
✨ Smart investing for your personal savings goals and all levels of experience
✨ Customize your stock-and-bond risk level
✨ Access our financial advisors at an added cost

Get more with Betterment
💰 Manage money for everyday spending with Checking
💰 Retirement saving with an IRA (Roth IRA, Traditional IRA)
💰 Retirement planning with a 401(k) plan for your business

The proof is in the numbers (we like those around here)
💙 730,000+ clients
💙 $30.7 billion managed

See what we’re all about
📱 Instagram: @BettermentHQ
📱 Twitter: @Betterment

About us:
As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Get started in minutes with just $10. and no minimum balance. You can save for specific goals or keep it general. Then you’ll invest in expert-built stock-and-bond ETF or crypto portfolios.

Once you set up your investment goals, you can trust us to handle the details. Or, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can customize your portfolio, select your own ETFs, crypto, and more. And, as your financial advisor, we’ll give you guidance on how to make smart decisions to work toward achieving your financial savings goals along the way.

You can also make an impact with your investment portfolio. Our Socially Responsible Investing ESG portfolio options (Broad Impact, Social Impact and Climate Impact) enable you to invest in stock-and-bond ETFs that support minority empowerment, gender diversity, sustainability, and the funding of green projects. Our Sustainable crypto portfolio helps you invest in cryptocurrencies that support lower carbon emissions.

Keep track of your financial life across your short and long-term savings goals with one easy-to-use app.

Start investing with Betterment today, for a better tomorrow.
---
Images are hypothetical.

Checking accounts and the Betterment Visa Debit Card provided and issued by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. Checking made available through Betterment Financial LLC. Neither Betterment Financial LLC, nor any of their affiliates, is a bank. Betterment Financial LLC reimburses ATM fees and the Visa® 1% foreign transaction fee worldwide, everywhere Visa is accepted.

Higher bond allocations in your portfolio decreases the percentage attributable to socially responsible ETFs.

About us:
As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Get started in minutes with just $10. and no minimum balance. You can save for specific goals or keep it general. Then you’ll invest in expert-built stock-and-bond ETF or crypto portfolios.

Once you set up your investment goals, you can trust us to handle the details. Or, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can customize your portfolio, select your own ETFs, crypto, and more. And, as your financial advisor, we’ll give you guidance on how to make smart decisions to work toward achieving your financial savings goals along the way.

You can also make an impact with your investment portfolio. Our Socially Responsible Investing ESG portfolio options (Broad Impact, Social Impact and Climate Impact) enable you to invest in stock-and-bond ETFs that support minority empowerment, gender diversity, sustainability, and the funding of green projects. Our Sustainable crypto portfolio helps you invest in cryptocurrencies that support lower carbon emissions.

Keep track of your financial life across your short and long-term savings goals with one easy-to-use app.

Start investing with Betterment today, for a better tomorrow.

title: Betterment Invest & Save Money

creator: Betterment
descriptionHtml:
Invest and save better with Betterment. Investing apps are a dime a dozen, right? So, you might be wondering why you should download this investing app. It’s simple: Betterment is a robo advisor built to make investing and saving easy, with a personalized experience that fits your needs whether you’re an investor-in-training or a stock market guru. Invest and save your money for the things you want most, so you can live better. Join the 770,000+ people who entrust us with over $34 billion.

As an independent digital investment advisor and fiduciary, Betterment’s mission is to help you do what’s best for your money so you can live better. Get started in minutes with just $10 and no minimum balance. Keep track of your financial life across your short- and long-term savings goals with one easy-to-use app.

INVEST IN YOUR FUTURE
- Choose from a list of expert-built, curated portfolios of ETFs
- Go beyond your 401(k) with a traditional or Roth IRA
- Limit your tax impact with automated tax tools and strategies, like tax-loss harvesting and tax coordination between accounts

WE MAKE IT EASY
- Sign up in 3 minutes
- Start investing with a $10 min deposit
- No minimum balance

GROW YOUR CASH WITH 4.00% APY (as of 3/15/23)
- Cash Reserve secures your money during volatile times while earning a high yield (12x the national average)**
- FDIC insurance covers your money up to $2M ($4M for joint accounts) at our program banks – that’s 8x* what most banks offer

AUTOMATE YOUR FINANCES
- Set up recurring deposits on your preferred schedule
- Rebalance your portfolio and reinvest dividends automatically

PERSONALIZED
- Smart investing for your personal savings goals and all levels of experience.
- Customize your stock-and-bond risk level.
- Choose how your money will make an impact with Socially Responsible Investing options. Pick from our Broad, Social, or Climate Impact portfolios.
- Questions? We’ve got resources galore or ask our financial advisors!

KEEP MORE OF YOUR MONEY
- Invest with us for just $4/month, or pay an annual fee of 0.25% on your investing account balance when you:
- Have a total Betterment balance of $20,000 or more across any accounts you hold at Betterment, or
- Set up a recurring deposit(s) of $250/month or more into any account
- Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access to advisors at just .4% of your invested
assets, a fraction of the cost compared with traditional advisors
- These are CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ professionals, salaried never commissioned, for a significantly lower management fee

TURN LIFE GOALS INTO MONEY GOALS
- Save for that exercise bike, your next vacation, and more
- Use our projection tools to create a plan
- Calculate how to reach your target with our goal forecaster

SEE THE BIGGER PICTURE
- Get our all-in-one financial dashboard
- Connect outside accounts, see your net worth, and view your investment performance, all in one place

GET MORE WITH BETTERMENT
- Crypto Investing with diversified expert-built portfolios and in-depth resources
- Manage money for everyday spending with Checking
- Retirement planning with a 401(k) plan for your business

---

*Standard insurance amount of $250,000 per depositor, per insured bank, is provided by the FDIC and subject to FDIC requirements.

**National average savings account interest rate is reported by the FDIC (as of 1/17/23) as the average annual percentage yield (APY) for savings accounts with deposits under $100,000.

Checking accounts and the Betterment Visa Debit Card provided and issued by nbkc bank, Member FDIC. Checking made available through Betterment Financial LLC. Neither Betterment Financial LLC, nor any of their affiliates, is a bank.
